title: Manage Stormwater Pollution Prevention Plan (SWPPP) Inspection
description: A government inspector is on site to conduct a SWPPP inspection. The safety manager must provide the required documentation.

tasks.description: Retrieve the project's current SWPPP document.
tasks.expected_outcome: The latest version of the SWPPP is retrieved.

tasks.description: Retrieve the SWPPP inspection logs for the past 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: All recent inspection logs are retrieved.

tasks.description: Provide both the plan and the logs to the inspector.
tasks.expected_outcome: The required documents are presented to the inspector for their review.
